description: Explore Marinade documentation and get quick answers with direct links to anthropic guides. Monitor real-time protocol state on Solana, including prices, rewards, and staking metrics. Manage liquid staking with mSOL, check balances, and send tokens between wallets.

tools.name: search_documentation
tools.title: Search Marinade Finance Documentation
tools.description: Search across the documentation to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides. Use this tool when you need to answer questions about Marinade Finance Docs, find specific documentation, understand how features work, or locate implementation details. The search returns contextual content with titles and direct links to the documentation pages.

tools.name: get_marinade_state
tools.title: Get Marinade State
tools.description: Retrieve the current state of the Marinade Finance protocol, including information about staked assets, mint address, price, rewards, and other relevant data.
